rooms.name: storageRoom
rooms.description: This is what appears to be an old storage closet. You see dusty shelves with spider webs. A few objects line the shelves, such as cups and a broom. There is a stench of stale air mixed with pine. Perhaps someone once kept the dungeon clean.

rooms.name: campRoom
rooms.description: This room appears to be where someone has made camp. There are ashes where a fire was made, but has been long extinguished. A bedroll lies nearby. The rest of the room is sparse.

rooms.name: lakeRoom
rooms.description: A dark pool with an ornately carved stone lip fills the center of this room.  The water is very still.  You can't tell how deep it is.

rooms.name: stalactiteRoom
rooms.description: Stalactites in many colors festoon the ceiling in this room.  The floor is bumpy with their partner stalagmites.  You'll have to pick your way through carefully.

rooms.name: obitalControlRoom
rooms.description: This room appears to have many computers running at once with a large screen detailing various other places in the world. How did you get here?

rooms.name: dungeonRoom
rooms.description: The smell hits you before you have time to take in your surroundings. It's dark, with chains and cages lining the walls, lit with lightly flickering torches.

rooms.name: dragonCave
rooms.description: As you enter the room, you see a two dragons lying around a raised stone platform. The edges of the room are darkened and they do not appear to be paying attention to you.

rooms.name: labyrinth
rooms.description: A massive, ornate twisting maze sprawls before you. It's really easy.

rooms.name: elevator
rooms.description: A tight-fitting room with buttons for NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST on a square, brass panel.

rooms.name: throneRoom
rooms.description: A lavish vaulted hall leads up a set of stone stairs to a large throne. Torches light the walls and tapastry that hang from the ceiling.

rooms.name: deskRoom
rooms.description: Ancient wood hewn desks litter an open room. Countless faded equations besmear a framed chalkboard on the far wall.

rooms.name: stable
rooms.description: A wooden stable with some hay and horses. If you ask to ride one they say neigh

rooms.name: royalBathHouse
rooms.description: Is that a waterfall over there? Sometimes it's good to be the king

rooms.name: aquarium
rooms.description: The walls of this room are lined with glass behind which you see large aquatic creatures just sort of hanging out.

rooms.name: forestRoom
rooms.description: The room opens up to show a thick forest brush intermixed with trees. It is quiet, too quiet.

rooms.name: temple
rooms.description: You find yourself in what appears to be a long abandoned room of worship, the altar at the center appears to bear the insignia of a long forgotton deity.

rooms.name: werewolfCircle
rooms.description: You find what appears to be a hotel conference room. Within it are peopel rythmically tapping on there legs with one person standing around the directing them. There are mutterings about a werewolf.

rooms.name: dnD
rooms.description: You see five people sitting around a table, wearing robes, starting at paper, and screaming at plastic polyhedrons.
